title: How to Play Single Player (Solo) Maps in Halo Ce

steps.headline: Take the map you just got out of it's .zip folder and place it into the MAPS folder of Halo CE.
steps.description: See the wikiHow page on How to fly a Halo pelican for more info on transferring these .map files into halo CE

steps.headline: Go into the properties section of Halo CE by right clicking and selecting properties.
steps.description: In the top most text area, type this exact phrase at the end: -screenshot -console". The text area is originally ""C:\Program Files\Microsoft Games\Halo Custom Edition\haloce.exe".

steps.headline: Once you add the end part, it should look EXACTLY like this: ""C:\Program Files\Microsoft Games\Halo Custom Edition\haloce.exe" -screenshot -console"
steps.description: This activates the console so you can play solo

steps.headline: Get to the main menu where you can select things like "multiplayer", "settings", "credits", etc.
Hit the Tilde button.
steps.description: (It looks like this ~ or ` and should be above the tab button)

text: Take the map you just got out of it's .zip folder and place it into the MAPS folder of Halo CE. See the wikiHow page on How to fly a Halo pelican for more info on transferring these .map files into halo CE Go into the properties section of Halo CE by right clicking and selecting properties. In the top most text area, type this exact phrase at the end: -screenshot -console". The text area is originally ""C:\Program Files\Microsoft Games\Halo Custom Edition\haloce.exe". Once you add the end part, it should look EXACTLY like this: ""C:\Program Files\Microsoft Games\Halo Custom Edition\haloce.exe" -screenshot -console" This activates the console so you can play solo Start up Halo CE.  Get to the main menu where you can select things like "multiplayer", "settings", "credits", etc.  Hit the Tilde button. (It looks like this ~ or ` and should be above the tab button) Look to the bottom of your screen, there should be a purplish flashy thing that says halo(:  Remember the name of the solo map you want to play. For example, lets say its called 'contact'. Type the name of the map after typing 'map_name'.  If done correctly, using our example from above, the bottom of your screen should look something like this:  halo(: map_name contact  Hit enter. Wait a tiny bit. Hit enter again if it doesn't start Enjoy your game!
